column3: An integer representing the starting index for generating the Fibonacci series.
An integer representing the ending index for generating the Fibonacci series.
A temporary variable used in the read method to store user input for the end value (not explicitly declared in the class).
A parameter in the fibo_series method representing the index of the Fibonacci number to be calculated.
A temporary variable in the display method that holds the Fibonacci number calculated for the current index i.
An instance of the Fibo class used to call methods for reading input and displaying the Fibonacci series.
